data: Marius Marius Kwayep is business manager of Move Limitless. He is one of the best coaches in Mechelen with a lot of experience and proven competencies. Marius is a certified sports coach with more than 7 years of experience as a personal trainer at professional sports centers. He holds an EREPS 4 certification and earned his degree from the well-known National Academy of Sports Medicine (NASM). In addition, Marius took additional courses around sports performance and is working as an instructor at Les Mills. How it began for Marius " When I became a father years ago, my views on healthy living and what constitutes a healthy work-life balance changed. Out of my passion for fitness, I founded Move Limitless. I haven't regretted it for a day, even though entrepreneurship involves a lot that you're not prepared for." Marius' areas of expertise At Move Limitless, Marius teaches private sessions , duo training, bootcamps and group training . He also specializes in coaching high-level sports players, including well-known soccer and basketball players. During functional training, Marius tackles several points at once, such as mobility, agility, strength,...
